rooms.description: Spacious living area with Mediterranean style decor and built-in seating areas.
Elegant dining space adjacent to the living room with a central courtyard view.
Modern Mediterranean kitchen integrated into an open-plan layout. Includes ample storage and ventilation.
Luxurious master bedroom with attached en-suite bathroom, placed according to Vastu for positive energy flow.
Cozy guest room on the ground floor with access to private courtyard area.
Dedicated home office space with ample natural light and sound insulation, designed for productivity.
Private bathroom for master bedroom. Features luxury fittings.
